          Maps to the id of each content item a multimap of its numerical meta attributes.

        • useForClustering

          java.util.Map<K,V> useForClustering
          Maps to the tag of each attribute a boolean that specifies if the attribute should be considered for category utility calculations during clustering. If an attribute is not contained in the map we assume "true".

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • attributeProbabilities

          com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<K,V> attributeProbabilities
          Attribute value - probability pairs.
          e.g.: 
             Rating Values  |    Probability
 -----------------------------------
       5          |       0.5
       1          |       0.25
       
 Probabilities do not necessarily add
 up to 1, due to the sparse nature of
 the user-content-rating matrix.

        • numericalMetaAttributes

          java.util.Map<K,V> numericalMetaAttributes
          The numerical background attributes of the node (e.g. gender, age, genre). Stores for each node that is an attribute of this node a mapping to an IAttribute object.

        • nominalMetaAttributes

          java.util.Map<K,V> nominalMetaAttributes
          The nominal background attributes of the node (e.g. gender, age, genre). Stores for each node that is an attribute of this node a mapping to an IAttribute object.

        • ratingAttributes

          java.util.Map<K,V> ratingAttributes
          The rating attributes of the node Stores for each node that is an attribute of this node a mapping to an IAttribute object.

          IDataset dataset
          Reference to the data set.

        • children

          java.util.Set<E> children
          The children of this node.

        • parent

          INode parent
          The parent of this node. Is null s long as the node was not merged.

        • dataSetId

          java.lang.String dataSetId
          The id of the represented data item in the data set. Is null if the size of this cluster is > 1.

        • categoryUtility

          double categoryUtility
          The category utility of the merge of this nodes children or 1 if node is leaf

    • Class ch.uzh.agglorecommender.clusterer.treesearch.ClusterSet extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • MAX_SUBSET_SIZE

          int MAX_SUBSET_SIZE
          All generated subsets have size <= MAX_SUBSET_SIZE. This limit reduces the number of generated sets from 
           C(set_size, 2) +  C(set_size, 3) + ... + C(set_size,set_size)

          to 
           C(set_size, 2) +  C(set_size, 3) + ... + C(set_size, MAX_SUBSET_SIZE)

          with n = set_size, m = length_of_sublist, and 
                            n!
  C(n,m) = ----------------
              m! (n - m)!

          Which is the binomial coefficient for nonnegative n and m: the number of ways of picking unordered outcomes from possibilities, also known as a combination or combinatorial number.
          (Calculating the complete power set would result in generating 2^n subsets.)

        • openNodes

          IndexAwareSet<E> openNodes
          Stores the instances to cluster.

        • combinationIndices

          java.util.Set<E> combinationIndices
          A list of all currently valid comparisons indices. Used to generate a the set of valid node comparisons.

        • combinationsMap

          com.google.common.collect.HashMultimap<K,V> combinationsMap
          Maps to each currently valid comparison index all possible comparisons (multimap). Used for keeping the combinationIndices set in sync with the cluster set.

        • cachedNodeLists

          java.util.Map<K,V> cachedNodeLists

    • Class ch.uzh.agglorecommender.clusterer.treesearch.NoCommonRatingAttributeSkipMaxCUSearcher extends MaxCategoryUtilitySearcherDecorator implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • combinationsIndicesWithSharedAttributes

          gnu.trove.set.TIntSet combinationsIndicesWithSharedAttributes
          Keeps track of combinations which have been identified as combinations with shared nodes. These combinations won't be tested on shared attributes in a subsequent clustering cycle again. This means that combination id's contained in this set will never be removed from the set of combinations passed to @code{getMaxCategoryUtilityMerges} to calculate its category utility by this decorator.

    • Class ch.uzh.agglorecommender.clusterer.treesearch.SharedMaxCategoryUtilitySearcher extends BasicMaxCategoryUtilitySearcher implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

          ClassitMaxCategoryUtilitySearcher classit
          Calculates classit category utility.

        • cobweb

          CobwebMaxCategoryUtilitySearcher cobweb
          Calculates cobweb category utility.
